text: Sparsham is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Mohan Roop. The film stars Manoj K. Jayan, Thilakan, Murali and Siddique in the lead roles. The film has musical score by Sharreth. ==Cast== *Manoj K. Jayan as Mahesh *Kaveri as Arudhathi *Priya Raman as Rajani *Thilakan as Pothuval Ashan *Murali as Valappil Raghavan *Siddique as Ashokan *Chandni Shaju as Meera *Jagadish as Shivadasan *Manuraj as Prasad *Meena Ganesh as Bhargaviyamma *Ponnamma Babu as Sarojini *Sarath Haridas as Manu * Tony as Hareedran *Sathaar as Rajashekharan *T. S. Raju as Sreekandan Nair *Vishnu Prasad - Cameo Appearance ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by Sharreth and the lyrics were written by S.
